string.name: content
string.ul:
Ensure that the company seal and safety cap is fixed securely on your gas cylinder.


Your LPG cylinder should be fixed at ground level on a plain surface.


Never use lit match-sticks or candles to look for leakages.


Turn the regulator knob to OFF position once you are done using it.


Do not place the cylinder inside an enclosed compartment.


Never leave vessels unattended on burners in operation. The contents may overflow, extinguish the flame and cause leakage.


Self repair is unsafe.
